header.title: Frequently Asked Questions
header.subtitle: Have a question? We're here to help.

contactSection.title: Still have a question?
contactSection.subtitle: Can't find the answer you're looking for? Please chat with our friendly team.

q1.question: What are your company's official licenses and registration numbers?
q1.answer: Breva Coffee is fully licensed and compliant with all applicable food safety and commercial regulations. Please contact us for full credential details.

q2.question: How can I get pricing for your coffee products?
q2.answer: Please visit our Store Page for current prices. For shipping costs or bulk pricing, contact our Sales Department at info@brevacoffee.com.

q3.question: How do I request a proforma invoice?
q3.answer: Select your desired products with specifications and send details via email or WhatsApp. Our team responds within 24 hours. Phone support is available from 9 AM to 6 PM.

q4.question: What is the shelf life of your coffee?
q4.answer: Our whole bean coffee has a shelf life of 12 months from the roast date. Ground coffee is best consumed within 6 months.

q5.question: How should I store coffee?
q5.answer: Store in a cool, dry place away from direct light and heat. Keep in an airtight container. Avoid the refrigerator as moisture affects flavor.

q6.question: How long are your prices valid?
q6.answer: Our prices are updated regularly based on market conditions. Quoted prices are valid for 7 days. For large orders, we can extend price validity.

q7.question: What are your bulk packaging options?
q7.answer: For bulk orders: 1kg vacuum-sealed bags, available in whole bean or ground, packed in standard export cartons.

q8.question: What are your minimum and maximum order quantities?
q8.answer: Retail: Minimum 250g, shipped to your address. Wholesale: Minimum 10kg, maximum 500kg per order, shipped to your destination.

q9.question: Do you provide coffee quality analysis?
q9.answer: Yes. All our coffee is tested and cupping scores are available upon request. We work with certified quality control labs.

q10.question: Do you offer private labeling?
q10.answer: Yes. We provide custom packaging and private labeling for orders over 10kg.

q11.question: What export documents do you provide?
q11.answer: We provide all required export documents: Packing List, Lab Analysis Report, Phytosanitary Certificate, Certificate of Origin, Commercial Invoice, Customs Declaration, and Air Waybill or Transport Bill.

q12.question: What are your payment terms?
q12.answer: 50% advance payment, 50% balance before shipment. We accept bank transfer and other agreed payment methods.

q13.question: What is your delivery time?
q13.answer: Orders are shipped within 7-14 days after payment confirmation, delivered to your destination port or address.

q14.question: How do you ship products?
q14.answer: We ship via express post, air freight, or sea freight depending on destination and order size.

q15.question: How can I become an exclusive distributor?
q15.answer: Contact us via email at info@brevacoffee.com with your request. We welcome exclusive partnership and distribution opportunities.
